        public javax.swing.JPopupMenu getOpenGroupPopup(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Specified by:
        getOpenGroupPopup in interface OpenGroupComponentModel
        Returns:
        the popup menu for the open group (if null is returned then the default popup menu is used, return a empty popup menu for no popup)

      • getOpenGroupComponent

        public TaskGraphPanel getOpenGroupComponent(TaskGraph taskgraph,
                                   TrianaClient client)
        Specified by:
        getOpenGroupComponent in interface OpenGroupComponentModel
        Returns:
        the taskgraph panel used to represent the specified taskgraph (if null is returned then the default component is used)

      • getOpenGroupAction

        public javax.swing.Action getOpenGroupAction(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Specified by:
        getOpenGroupAction in interface OpenGroupComponentModel
        Returns:
        the action that is invoked when a group is activated (e.g. the workspace is double-clicked). If null is returned the default workspace action is used.

      • getMultipleSelectedPopup

        public javax.swing.JPopupMenu getMultipleSelectedPopup(Task[] tasks)
        Specified by:
        getMultipleSelectedPopup in interface OpenGroupComponentModel
        Returns:
        the popup menu when multiple tasks are selected in the workspace (if null is returned then the default popup menu is used, return a empty popup menu for no popup)
